query:
UPDATE calendars 
         SET
            name = COALESCE($1, name),
            description = COALESCE($2, description),
            colour = COALESCE($3, colour),
            timezone = COALESCE($4, timezone),
            caldav_url = COALESCE($5, caldav_url),
            sync_token = COALESCE($6, sync_token)
         WHERE id = $7 AND owner_id = $8
